column2: "They're pretty fast for such big guys, huh? Seriously, that's way too agile!"
"And they got power to match! If ya get hit by one of their slash attacks, you're in for a whole world of pain!"
"So I need your help, killer. You gotta show me how you fight them!"
"It's training for you, and a great example for me! You know how much I'm countin' on you, killer!"
